sentences.en: Dogs bark, cocks crow, frogs croak to each other.
sentences.cn: 犬吠, 鸡鸣, 蛙儿对唱.

sentences.en: Everyone seemed rather out of sorts and inclined to croak .
sentences.cn: 每个人似乎都有点不对劲，想发发牢骚。

sentences.en: Everyone seemed rather out of sorts and inclined to croak.
sentences.cn: 每个人似乎都有点不对劲,想发发牢骚.

sentences.en: Frogs began to croak with the rainfall.
sentences.cn: 蛙随着雨落开始哇哇叫.

sentences.en: He sat on the playground listening to the distant croak.
sentences.cn: 他坐在操场上,聆听远处的蛙鸣.

sentences.en: His voice was just a croak.
I had a sore throat and could only croak.
sentences.cn: 我喉咙痛，只能哑着嗓子说话。

sentences.en: Mr. Higginbotham went on accusingly , " An'he'll croak in the gutter the same way. You know that. "
sentences.cn: 希金波坦先生继续指摘, “ 有一天也照样会醉倒在阳沟里去哼哼的, 这你知道. ”

sentences.en: She could only croak because of her heavy cold.
sentences.cn: 她因患重感冒只能用沙哑的声音说话.

sentences.en: Thousands of frogs croaked in the reeds by the riverbank.
sentences.cn: 成千上万只青蛙在河岸的芦苇中呱呱地叫。

words.tran_cn: 呱呱叫的；（声音）低沉而沙哑的
嘎声的人；喊冤者，鸣冤者

trans.tran_en: the sound that a  frog  makes
to make a deep low sound like the sound a  frog  makes
